animeTitle: Valkyrie Choukyou Semen Tank no Ikusa Otome 10-nin Shimai
animeDescription: During summer holidays, Katsuragi reports to the Tsubaratera household to work as a butler in accordance to his grandfather's will. There, he meets the spoiled and willful Tsubaratera Kotoha.(Source: translated and adapted from official site by Cranston)
